Package payroll_processing_system

Class PayrollProcessing

java.lang.Object
payroll_processing_system.PayrollProcessing
public class PayrollProcessing
extends java.lang.Object
PayrollProcessing class provides the interface for communicating with a Company object and handles input and output by processing commands from the console.This includes dealing with additions/removal to a Company, processing payments, printing earnings statements, etc.
Author:
Hugo De Moraes, Jonathan Dong

      date - date object to be evaluated
